title: President Donald J. Trump Is Taking A Stand For Democracy and Human Rights In the Western Hemisphere â€“ The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
April 17, 2019
When Venezuela is free, and Cuba is free, and Nicaragua is free, this will become the first free hemisphere in all of human history.
						President Donald J. Trump					HOLDING THE CUBAN DICTATORSHIP ACCOUNTABLE: President Donald J. Trump is holding the Cuban regime accountable for its repression of the Cuban people.STANDING WITH THE PEOPLE OF VENEZUELA: President Trump is standing with the Venezuelan people and has imposed tough sanctions targeting the corrupt, former regime. PROMOTING DEMOCRACY IN NICARAGUA: President Trump is committed to restoring liberty, democracy, and the rule of law in Nicaragua.
